data.text: @EU_Commission Pl. put #sciencegirlthing clip back on campaign website. Let's analyse attitude of people who see sexy girls, short skirts!
@EU_commission: Geen veranderingen in #EU status van nu, eerst op #democratische wijze gekozen #leiders en een #referendum.
@EU_commission please add me to #realwomanofscience
@EU_Commission #realwomeninscience
@EU_Commission To see girls in science-is-girl-thing video as sexy is a sexist way of thinking. They're selfconscious, ambitious, active!
